message.body: @flyman@zid: English steals a lot of common words from French to mean "smart" things. Not that I can think of any off the top of my head.
Hello @yilmazerkan@zv
Which is cooler to have after your name, @zv or @zid?
I get the feeling this chat system is doing something very expensive every time someone sends a message.
@zarka@zid: I feel sorry for the Québécois having to come up with their own words for such things.
@yilmazerkan@zv: Because I get throttled if I try talking too fast, and I'm guessing it's implemented by updating a torrent.
/me responds in LIFO order because the scrollback is upside down.
/me waves
Is there some way to publish changes to a 0site without shutting down zeronet to do it?
Oh never mind it looks like I can just do that from the left hand nav
Though it always says "1 file update failed"
night @musickiller@zid
hi @yilmazerkan@zv
all is grand, thanks. How about with you?
maybe good if it is the appropriate time of day for that, maybe not so good
That case kinda takes the wind out of the sails of anyone claiming Germany is a free country.
Daesh make for strange bedfellows.
@0penworld@zv: you guys need a .bit domain
Speaking of which, is there any point to mining namecoin with a CPU, or should I give up now and ask someone else to register a domain for me?
@yilmazerkan@zv: thanks. If I give you a receiver key I don't have to trust you past initial registration, right?
Or at least, I imagine it would be obvious if you continued to have access to muck with the domain.
@yilmazerkan@zv: an address that is the one that's allowed to make future modifications, renew, etc
versus your own
I can't remember where I saw that terminology
I think that's what I mean
New to this namecoin thing
I have namecoind running and trying to generate blocks but I'm guessing that will take (literally) forever.
how did you get nmc if I may ask?
trying to avoid having this identity connected to my meatspace identity in any way
because I want to avoid the "chilling effect" of worrying that the police will show up at my door because of what I say
I'd like to share my real views rather than my "sanitized for social media" views
no payment yet for renewal, right?
I have namecoind running behind tor
ah, so I should probably spend my time trying to figure out how to get nmc that aren't linked to my meatspace identity in any way
why not?
is this "not a protection" in the sense of "namecoin has known ways it leaks your identity" or in the sense of "namecoin hasn't been audited to make sure it doesn't leak your identity"?
I'm OK with the latter, since I am not trying to protect myself for purposes of doing anything more illegal than piracy and saying inflammatory things

I am familiar with I2P. I'm more inclined to trust Tor because it's gotten a lot more attention. I2P doesn't improve on Tor's design in any fundamental way; it's still low-latency, and there are probably a lot of vulnerabilites that haven't been discovered/exploited because it's never been used by a Silk Road.
I don't require perfection.
My approach is "make spying more expensive" combined with "don't provide a high-value target"
Hidden services are not good enough to protect a target as valuable as a Silk Road, nor do I expect they will ever be made good enough to
The site itself needs to be decentralized, which makes it much easier to protect the person/people injecting content into it
Because then even whoever your DPR is will be "just a user"
gnunet seems to be the best designed high-latency network, but it seems to have no users
freenet seems dangerous, but I'm not aware of anyone having been arrested for using it yet
unless this recent CP bust included freenet users
actually another fatal flaw is Tor's design is that it involves letting "raw" web browsers talk to shady web servers
which makes it very easy for the child pornographers at the FBI to run CP sites that inject malware
@yilmazerkan@zv: police seized hardware because it had pirated music on it?
what country?
@yilmazerkan@zv: I'm interested in namecoin because it seems like an interesting concept and I want to learn more about it by using it
particularly I like this notion that it "squares zooko's triangle"
though that's also sort of proven by twister
